short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A serene nightscape, featuring a stunning view of the moon rising against a dramatic

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The large moon shines brightly over a silhouetted tree, providing a calm and peaceful atmosphere. With built-in functionality to display real-time weather updates, the current date and time, customizable icons for quick access, and the latest news headlines, this extension enhances both the aesthetics and functionality of your browser's new tab page. Perfect for those who enjoy a combination of tranquility and productivity.
